subject: Basketball
Auctions
lead_paragraph: The first rules of basketball, as set down by Dr. James Naismith on two typewritten pages, will be auctioned Dec. 10 by Sotheby’s, which expects the heirloom to sell for at least $2 million.
snippet: The first rules of basketball, as set down by Dr. James Naismith on two typewritten pages, will be auctioned Dec. 10 by Sotheby’s, which expects the heirloom to sell for at least $2 million.
